response.original_title: One Way Street: Fragments for Walter Benjamin
response.overview: Walter Benjamin is one of the most influential thinkers of the 20th century, yet his work is relatively unknown to many. One Way Street is both an exposition of Benjaminâ€™s ideas and a search for Benjamin the man in locations as diverse as the academics of Moscow, the bookstores of New York, Parisienne arcades and the cemetery in a Spanish costal village that has become a place of pilgrimage for Benjamin devotees.
response.title: One Way Street: Fragments for Walter Benjamin
